evidence.claim: APKSoft utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, including Lambda and S3 services.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance in its health-tech services.
Information on the use of X12 for electronic health transactions is detailed in their developer documentation.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs and webhooks, as mentioned in their API documentation.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA X12 EDI integration indicates a strong fit with our API-first platform.
